author: Special Correspondent
text:
The strength of Survey Department in the district is poised to go up shortly after the duration of on-going two-month training for a group of new recruits. The training initiated on February 22 is being imparted to 35 new recruits: 17 posted in Erode district and the rest in Namakkal district. They were all chosen for the post of Field Surveyor based on Group IV examination conducted by Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission.

The training modules consist of conventional survey methods as well as modern surveying based on Global Positioning System and Electronic Total Station.
title: Training for surveyors
